column1: [Wojnarowski] Reporting w/ @RamonaShelburne: Brooklyn’s acquiring James Harden in a three-way deal with Cleveland. Caris LeVert, Dante Exum, Rodions Kurucs, four 1st round picks – including Cavs’ 2022 first via Bucks -- and 4 Nets pick swaps to Rockets. Jarrett Allen, Taurean Prince to Cavs.

[Charania] Sources: Full current trade: Rockets: Victor Oladipo, Dante Exum, Rodions Kurucs, 3 BKN first-rounders (22, 24, 26), 1 MIL first (22, unprotected), 4 BKN 1st round swaps (21, 23, 25, 27) Nets: James Harden Pacers: Caris LeVert, 2nd-rounder Cavs: Jarrett Allen, Taurean Prince

[Wojnarowski] Reporting w/ @RamonaShelburne: Brooklyn’s acquiring James Harden in a three-way deal with Cleveland. Caris LeVert, Dante Exum, Rodions Kurucs, four 1st round picks – including Cavs’ 2022 first via Bucks -- and 4 Nets pick swaps to Rockets. Jarrett Allen, Taurean Prince to Cavs.

[Andrews] Jarrett Allen, Caris LeVert, Rodi Kurucs and Taurean Prince -- all part of the James Harden deal -- are all now OUT tonight against the Knicks, Steve Nash says. They are not in Madison Square Garden.

Jarrett Allen and Taurean Prince did not practice, per Bickerstaff. Trade is still held up by a player who hasn't passed a physical. It has to be LeVert, hes the only one left. Could the trade fall through if LeVert has an undisclosed injury that makes the Pacers not want to trade him for Oladipo?
[Highlight] Taurean Prince feeling it - pulls up from deep
Chris Webber continues to mistake Taurean Prince for DeMarre Carroll

[Adrian Wojnarowski] on Twitter: Brooklyn’s acquiring James Harden in a three-way deal with Cleveland. Caris LeVert, Dante Exum, Rodions Kurucs, four 1st round picks – including Cavs’ 2022 first via Bucks -- and 4 Nets pick swaps to Rockets. Jarrett Allen, Taurean Prince to Cavs.
Chris Webber mistakes Taurean Prince for Demarre Carroll
[Andrews] Without Kevin Durant, the Nets will start: Kyrie/Bruce Brown/Taurean Prince/Jeff Green/Jarrett Allen
[Highlight] Richard Jefferson: "If Taurean Prince played like this, they might not have traded him. He might not have been included in the trade if he was playing like this."
Why did the Nets trade the 17th pick for Taurean Prince and also hand him a huge extension?

[Vardon] Kevin Porter Jr grew angry when he entered the locker room and realized the team gave his old locker to Taurean Prince, who was acquired in a trade. Porter, whose locker was moved to the wall where the younger, end-of-bench players reside, began yelling and at one point threw food

Taurean Prince finishes with 25/4/3 on 9-13 from the field, 6-8 from 3 against the Hornets
[Russo] #Cavs forward Taurean Prince is expected to undergo season-ending surgery for an ankle injury, sources tell @TheAthletic.
[Highlight] Isaiah Hartenstein long overhead pass to Taurean Prince who punches it down
[Detail Thread] The Cleveland Cavaliers acquire Ricky Rubio, a 2nd Round Pick in 2022 and cash from the Minnesota Timberwolves in exchange for Taurean Prince.
[Wojnarowski] TRADE: The Cleveland Cavaliers are acquiring Minnesota Timberwolves G Ricky Rubio, a 2022 second-round pick and cash for F Taurean Prince, sources tell ESPN.
[Wojnarowski] TRADE: The Cleveland Cavaliers are acquiring Minnesota Timberwolves G Ricky Rubio, a 2022 second-round pick and cash for Taurean Prince, sources tell ESPN.
[Woj] TRADE: The Cleveland Cavaliers are acquiring Minnesota Timberwolves G Ricky Rubio, a 2022 second-round pick and cash for Taurean Prince, sources tell ESPN.
[Marc Stein] The Timberwolves officially announce the completion of their trade of Ricky Rubio to CLEVELAND for Taurean Prince, cash and a 2022 second-round pick.
[Fischer] Cleveland is sending Minnesota $2.5 million as part of the Ricky Rubio-Taurean Prince swap, per source.
[Wojnarowski] TRADE: The Cleveland Cavaliers are acquiring Minnesota Timberwolves G Ricky Rubio, a 2022 second-round pick and cash for F Taurean Prince, sources tell ESPN.
The Cleveland Cavaliers acquire Ricky Rubio from the Minnesota Timberwolves in exchange for Taurean Prince, a 2nd Round Pick in 2022 and cash.
[Stein] The Wolves officially announce the completion of their trade of Ricky Rubio to Cleveland for Taurean Prince, cash and 2022 second-round pick.
[Fischer] Minnesota remains open to moving Taurean Prince after acquiring the forward from Cleveland as the Timberwolves continue to look for reinforcements in their frontcourt.
New Timberwolves owner smoking stogies with DLo and Taurean Prince
New Timberwolves owner A-Rod smoking stogies with DLo and Taurean Prince

[Moore] Was interesting to hear Taurean Prince explain how chronic his ankle injury has been over the past few years. Prince had surgery this summer and said that has made it so he can walk around in the mornings without pain. Says his ankle is back.
The Cavs traded Taurean Prince and a 2nd rounder for $18M of Ricky Rubio. The Lakers traded Kuzma, KCP, Trez, and a 1st rounder for $44M of Russ.
